comments.author: drwhobox
comments.body: I am not good at finding the meaning of artwork or maybe I don't have the creative mind to find out the secrets in your art. I can see an object with a torch, but I looked for Theymos and tried hard enough to find him and the moon. But in the end I am not able to find anything that refers to Theymos. Can you please explain your artwork? Though my first impression of the art is not positive.

comments.author: Sarah Azhari
comments.body: I see your image is a similar thing when searching it on the internet, like this 1 for example https://theastrologypodcast.com/tag/aspect-patterns/So if you copy pasta and edit it better to put the link your source.And, I agree with the post above, you must explain what that means, what planet and orbit do satoshi and theymoy have? and how do you feel they are is part of galaxy.

comments.author: digaran

comments.author: tread93
comments.body: Quote from: SeeBiscuit on February 28, 2023, 11:16:48 PMHi guys. I made a piece of art that depicts satoshi handing the forum over to theymos.Here it is:satoshi is the one passing the torch. theymos is kneeling on the moon.Personally, I'm using it as my wallpaper. You guys may use it the same way or any way you like.I'm a newer forum member, having only been on here for a year and some change. I would, however, love to hear what some OG bitcoiners think of this piece.<3Wow this is really cool man! Great work here looks very interesting. What did you use to create this?

comments.author: Plaguedeath
comments.body: Quote from: Sarah Azhari on March 01, 2023, 12:19:19 AMI see your image is a similar thing when searching it on the internet, like this 1 for example https://theastrologypodcast.com/tag/aspect-patterns/So if you copy pasta and edit it better to put the link your source.  Those 8 planets have their own appearance, are you hope the @OP to draw Saturn without a ring around?  anyway the art you provide and the @OP drawing are completely different. I wouldn't call it plagiarism since it's not from someone art or brand, it's a science which can't be changed.How about this? I'm pretty sure everyone know the original art lol.I think what @OP mean is Bitcoin is universal and there's no one can stop it.
